Articles.Content:
Hello there.

This is my personal challenge(only for me!).

I wanted to show my friend i can land on mun on first attempt,without quicsaves and under 5 minutes.

Well,i did it.

My time is 4m29s

And return time is counted in (counting only until full parachute open.

If you beat me,i'll give you my .craft file.

PS:I use NovaPunch and Re-entry heat

Edited September 28, 2012 by EvilotionCR2

I would!

If only alot of mod parts didnt crash my game...
I'll give it a shot later, I'm sure im gonna over-shoot warping when descending to mun so that I'm at 10000m with 600m/s xD. Anyways, impressive time
Very interesting, might attempt this later after I finish my current Duna Project.

Guys ,if you want to be a real challenge i copy it to challenges...

Yes and moderation team can you please again lock it for me please?
I did it in negative three minutes.
